abilities.name: Action Surge
abilities.description: Drannin takes an additional action on his turn.
abilities.recharge: (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).

abilities.name: Brute.
abilities.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Drannin hits with it (included in the attack).

abilities.name: Dwarven Resilience.
abilities.description: Drannin has advantage on saving throws against poison.

abilities.name: Indomitable
abilities.description: Drannin can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.
abilities.recharge: (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).

abilities.name: Second  Wind
abilities.description: Drannin can use a bonus action to regain 16 (1d10 + 11) hit points.
abilities.recharge: (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).

abilities.name: Special Equipment.
abilities.description: Drannin wears a control amulet for his shield guardian (see the Monster Manual) and a ring of cold resistance. He also carries a potion of frost giant strength.
